results.content: A good start for building Widgets!
I took this course to learn how to create a plugin with 4 text inputs for a customer. This course helped me a lot!
results.content_html: I took this course to learn how to create a plugin with 4 text inputs for a customer. This course helped me a lot!

results.content: This course wasn't bad, but it was more basic than I expected.  I was hoping for a more in-depth explanation of the widget code and thought I'd be taught how to create a more complex widget.  Also, the last quiz is actually a survey, but if you don't answer what she wants to hear, you're marked incorrect.
results.content_html: This course wasn't bad, but it was more basic than I expected. I was hoping for a more in-depth explanation of the widget code and thought I'd be taught how to create a more complex widget. Also, the last quiz is actually a survey, but if you don't answer what she wants to hear, you're marked incorrect.

results.content: You are better off reading the WordPress Codex! This course does not teach how to code from scratch. Instead it teaches how to copy some code from a pdf and changing parts of this copied code - without proper explanations.
results.content_html: You are better off reading the WordPress Codex! This course does not teach how to code from scratch. Instead it teaches how to copy some code from a pdf and changing parts of this copied code - without proper explanations.
